name: New Energy Solutions
overview:
The P/S BankInvest New Energy Solutions venture fund was established in 2002 by BankInvest Group and conducts its investment process as follows:

The Investment Management Team is responsible for investment case selection and brings their investment proposals to the Advisory Board, often utilizing specialist consultants in the case evaluation and due diligence process The Advisory Board is the principal advisory body for P/S BankInvest New Energy Solutions’ investments and portfolio company follow-up investments Specialist consultants are assigned to relevant projects and portfolio companies on a case by case basis, but function also as the fund’s sparring partners in the field of the Â»new energy worldÂ«

funding_round.source_description: Nujira secures $18 million in Series C funding
